 27/***********************************************************************
 28  Declarations
 29***********************************************************************/
 30
 31/// Expression template block for Generator expressions.
 32///
 33/// Requires:
 34///   DIM to be a dimension with range 0 < D <= VSIP_MAX_DIMENSION
 35///   GENERATOR to be a functor class with the following members:
 36///      OPERATOR()() to compute a value based given indices.
 37///      RESULT_TYPE to be the result type of operator()()
 38
 39template <dimension_type Dim,
 40	  typename       Generator>
 41class Generator_expr_block
 42  : public Generator,
 43    public Non_assignable
 44{
 45  // Compile-time values and typedefs.
 46public:
 47  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
 48  typedef typename Generator::result_type value_type;
 49
 50  typedef value_type&         reference_type;
 51  typedef value_type const&   const_reference_type;
 52  typedef Local_or_global_map<Dim> map_type;
 53
 54
 55  // Constructors.
 56public:
 57  Generator_expr_block(Length<Dim> size)
 58    : size_(size) {}
 59  Generator_expr_block(Length<Dim> size, Generator const& op)
 60    : Generator(op), size_(size) {}
 61
 62
 63  // Accessors.
 64public:
 65  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW
 66  { return total_size(size_); }
 67
 68  length_type size(dimension_type block_dim, dimension_type d)
 69    const VSIP_NOTHROW
 70  { assert(block_dim == Dim); return size_[d]; }
 71
 72  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 73  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
 74  map_type const& map() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return map_;}
 75
 76  value_type get(index_type i) const;
 77  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j) const;
 78  value_type get(index_type i, index_type j, index_type k) const;
 79
 80  // copy-constructor: default is OK.
 81
 82  // Member data.
 83private:
 84  Length<Dim> size_;
 85  map_type    map_;
 86};
 87
 88
 89
 90/// Specialize Is_expr_block for generator expr blocks.
 91
 92template <dimension_type Dim,
 93	  typename       Generator>
 94struct Is_expr_block<Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> >
 95{ static bool const value = true; };
 96
 97
 98
 99/// Specialize View_block_storage to control how views store generator
100/// expression template blocks.
101
102template <dimension_type Dim,
103	  typename       Generator>
104struct View_block_storage<const Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> >
105  : By_value_block_storage<const Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> >
106{};
107
108
109
110template <dimension_type Dim,
111	  typename       Generator>
112struct View_block_storage<Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> >
113{
114  // No typedef provided.
115};

119/***********************************************************************
120  Distributed Traits
121***********************************************************************/
122
123// NOTE: Distributed_local_block needs to be defined for const
124// Generator_expr_block, not regular Generator_expr_block.
125
126template <dimension_type Dim,
127	  typename       Generator>
128struct Distributed_local_block<Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const>
129{
130  typedef Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const type;
131  typedef Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const proxy_type;
132};
133
134
135
136template <dimension_type Dim,
137	  typename       Generator>
138Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const&
139get_local_block(
140  Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const& block)
141{
142  return block;
143}
144
145
146
147template <dimension_type Dim,
148	  typename       Generator>
149void
150assert_local(
151  Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const& /*block*/,
152  index_type                                  /*sb*/)
153{
154}

157template <dimension_type Dim, typename Generator>
158struct Choose_peb<Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const>
159{ typedef Peb_remap_tag type; };
160
161template <dimension_type Dim, typename Generator>
162struct Choose_peb<Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> >
163{ typedef Peb_remap_tag type; };
164
165
166template <typename       CombineT,
167	  dimension_type Dim,
168	  typename       Generator>
169struct Combine_return_type<CombineT,
170			   Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const>
171{
172  typedef Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> block_type;
173  typedef typename CombineT::template return_type<block_type>::type
174		type;
175  typedef typename CombineT::template tree_type<block_type>::type
176		tree_type;
177};
178
179
180
181template <typename       CombineT,
182	  dimension_type Dim,
183	  typename       Generator>
184struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> >
185{
186  typedef Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> block_type;
187  typedef typename CombineT::template return_type<block_type>::type
188		type;
189  typedef typename CombineT::template tree_type<block_type>::type
190		tree_type;
191};
192
193
194
195template <typename       CombineT,
196	  dimension_type Dim,
197	  typename       Generator>
198typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
199			     Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const>::type
200apply_combine(
201  CombineT const&                             combine,
202  Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const& block)
203{
204  return combine.apply(block);
205}
206
207
208
209template <typename       VisitorT,
210	  dimension_type Dim,
211	  typename       Generator>
212void
213apply_leaf(
214  VisitorT const&                             /*visitor*/,
215  Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator> const& /*block*/)
216{
217  // No-op
218}

224
225/***********************************************************************
226  Definitions
227***********************************************************************/
228
229template <dimension_type Dim,
230	  typename       Generator>
231inline typename Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator>::value_type
232Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator>::get(index_type i) const
233{
234  return (*this)(i);
235}
236
237template <dimension_type Dim,
238	  typename       Generator>
239inline typename Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator>::value_type
240Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator>::get(
241  index_type i,
242  index_type j) const
243{
244  return (*this)(i, j);
245}
246
247template <dimension_type Dim,
248	  typename       Generator>
249inline typename Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator>::value_type
250Generator_expr_block<Dim, Generator>::get(
251  index_type i,
252  index_type j,
253  index_type k) const
254{
255  return (*this)(i, j, k);
256}
